computePlatform.description: The compute platform can be `Server`, `Lambda`, or `ECS`. Default is `Server`.

deploymentConfigId.description: The AWS Assigned deployment config id

deploymentConfigName.description: The name of the deployment config.

minimumHealthyHosts.description: A minimum_healthy_hosts block. Required for `Server` compute platform. Minimum Healthy Hosts are documented below.

trafficRoutingConfig.description: A traffic_routing_config block. Traffic Routing Config is documented below.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering DeploymentConfig resources.
